item.description:
This month, Urban Greens is hosting PGD from 5-8pm at AS220, located at 115 Empire Street. Urban Greens will provide apps and AS220 has a great little bar. Urban Greens is also greening the event by contributing to People's Power and Light. 

 

For those who haven't heard about Urban Greens, they are working to open a full-scale consumer-owned cooperative grocery store in Providence, to provide direct access to affordable, local, and natural products. They will provide an alternative to corporate chain grocery stores; help support local farms and producers; and provide access to affordable healthy food in west and south Providence.   

 

Co-ops benefit both the individual member-owners and the broader community:   

  • Member-owners benefit because they have a direct say in the food they're eating and the store they shop at, and because the store is invested in its member-owners! They also receive financial benefits in the form of member sales, bulk ordering, and patronage dividends.
  • The Community benefits because more dollars are kept in the community as opposed to going to the central offices of a chain store, and the coop will be buying directly from local farmers, building local infrastructure and creating year-round access to healthier, tastier and more affordable food.

If you join Urban Greens now, you can help them reach their goal for founding members and open the cooperatively owned community store!

 

The Providence Green Drinks monthly gatherings (always held on "Thirsty Third Thursday") provide a great opportunity to meet with people in the area who are personally and/or professionally interested and involved in a variety of environmental, conservation, and sustainability issues. It's an informal and fun time and usually draws an eclectic group of several dozen people over the course of the evening.
item.how_to_find_us: Posted as an FYI - please RSVP if you're going so others can see who you are and look for you! If you'd like to host, please say so in your RSVP!
item.name: P-Collective FYI - Providence Green Drinks by Urban Greens at AS220!
